DTU Rankings
What’s new?

DTU is widely acknowledged as one of India's top universities. It consistently ranks in various categories, and in the NIRF ranking 2024, it received #66 rank in the 'Overall' category, showing its broad academic reach.

Read more

DTU has received strong ranks by the NIRF under the 'Overall' category. Provided parameters including, Teaching, Graduation Outcome, Inclusivity and Research, the institute is ranked in a good position as compared to other institutes by the NIRF 2024. It can be seen that the DTU's rankings in 'Overall' category have displayed a fluctuating trend as per the rankings of the previous years. In 2024, DTU fell 5 ranks to #66 rank in the 'Overall' category by the NIRF ranking.

It has been observed that the institute has displayed a decreasing trend in the 'University' category as compared to the ranking of preceding years. In 2024, DTU fell 8 ranks to #48 rank in the 'University' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has slipped in the rankings.

In the 'Engineering' category, the institute's ranks have ascended when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2024, DTU climbed 2 ranks to #27 rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has ascended in the rankings.

Refer to the rankings and categories from various ranking bodies in the table below.

B.E. / B.Tech352927

DTU has been ranked well by the India Today under the 'Technical Universities' category. Through the years, the India Today rankings for DTU indicate the institute's strong performance in crucial areas such as the Quality of Education, Conducting Impactful Research, the Expertise of Faculty members, and Overall Institutional Management. Rankings achieved by the institute under the 'Engineering' category have exibited a stable trend when compared to last year's rankings. In 2024, DTU's rank is #9, the same as last year's rank in the 'Engineering' category by the India Today ranking.

Across the years, it is to be noticed that DTU has consistently recognized as a highly-ranked institute across various categories in the QS World University Rankings. This underscores the institution's reputable status and its success in diverse aspects as per the rankings. In the 'Asia' category, the institute's ranks have descended when compared with the previous year's ranking. In 2024, DTU fell 100 ranks to #701 rank in the 'Asia' category by the QS World University Rankings. This is the second consecutive year that the institute has slipped in the rankings.

DTU's rankings in 'Southern Asia' category have exhibited a decreasing trend as per the rankings of the previous years. In 2024, DTU fell 59 ranks to #219 rank in the 'Southern Asia' category by the QS World University Rankings. Check the table for the DTU rankings 2024:

Jatin Vanwani
B.Tech. in Mathematics and Computing Engineering - Batch of 2028
3.6
4Placements3Infrastructure3Faculty4Crowd & Campus Life4Value for Money
DTU: Admission process and facilities.
Placements: Many companies visited campus this year which include Microsoft, Adobe, Samsung, Atlassian, and more. Some companies set a CGPA mark, like only above 8 are allowed to sit while some take tests for application. Some are open for only specific branches for specific posts like banks like Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan. Sometimes, they prefer math students. Students got placed in 2024. Around 2,000 companies visited. More than 300 students got placed. The average package offered in CSE is 20 LPA.
Infrastructure: The DTU infrastructure is very well made. All departments are very well placed along with their labs and other needs. The library is very huge. One can find any book he/she wants. The hostel is fine. It gets very mess sometimes during rain. The mess food is also fine not exceptional. The sports complex is very huge. We can play cricket, football, and volleyball at the same time. There is an indoor court for badminton and table tennis.
Faculty: The first-semester syllabus is almost the same for every branch. It might feel a little outdated. We are made to study physics, electrical, and graphics. Things changed in the second semester when course-specialized subjects came which are according to today's needs. The overall faculty is good. Mathematics is excellent. Some professors might be tough to handle. We have a mid-semester exam for 20/25 marks. The end-semester exam is for 40/50 marks. The rest marks include labs, CWS, assignments, and attendance.
Other: As visible growth in AI and interest in mathematics, I chose B.Tech in maths and computing. A lot of events occur every month but the main fests are sports, literary fest named Arena, technical fest Yuvaan, and cultural fests Invictus and Engifest.
Reviewed on 6 Feb 2025Read More

Review of DTU - Delhi Technological University.
Placements: All students can get placed in my course which is more than 75% every year. The highest package offered for my course is 18 LPA. The average package is 5 LPA. Top recruiting companies in India visit my college for recruitment. Percentage of internships is 40% from getting my college.
Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available in my college are nice. Everything is available at the college. Wi-Fi, classrooms, and library are present. The okayish college for design
Placements: For our batch, the placements are not good at all. It is very different from what is being advertised on public platforms and should not be taken for reference. But the situation might get better as my juniors are getting much better opportunities on campus than we got for our batch.
Infrastructure: The infrastructure, even after constant construction throughout my duration in college, is not good. On the surface, it might look good, but they lack the bare minimum stuff for it to be considered a good design college in the first place. They spend a lot of money on departments that were never required.
Faculty: Exams here are just formality; the main weightage is given to your big project of the semester for each of the subjects. That will be considered as the priority for the subject. But with a few exceptions, both the faculty and the curriculum are not that good.
Other: The campus life and your peers are where you'll get most of your learnings from. Just do not rely on the teachers in hopes that they will teach something good.

Basic information about DTU East Campus of B.A. (h) economics.

Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and experienced. Top-level teachers interact with students. There is a very modern method of teaching.
